attributes.action: Extend Furlough to those who changed jobs in March and April.
attributes.additional_details: I had my job offer early March and worked my month notice, my employer replaced me with two people, therefore unable to re-hire me. New employer can’t furlough me. There are thousands of us with no income, and benefits not covering essential bills.
attributes.background: Extend the criteria For those who had written job offers in place before the furlough date in March.
